title: Did Regeneron Trump develop using stem cells and fetal tissues?
subtitle: United States President Donald Trump has described an antibody cocktail as a COVID-19 stone that he intended to make available to the American public.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: The development of the REGN-COV2 pilot project, an antiviral cocktail submitted to US President Donald Trump for CAVID-19, involved the use of human embryo tissue and embryo stem cells.
